ref.title: Extraction of organic compounds involved in the kinetic resolution of rac-2-pentanol from n-hexane by imidazolium-based ionic liquids: Liquid-liquid equilibrium
ref.full: Montalban, M. G.; Collado-Gonzalez, M.; Lozano-Perez, A. A.; Banos, F. G. D.; Villora, G. (2018) J. Mol. Liq. 252, 445-453.
